requirement: This code is intended to implement a scaling function that converts a physical output value within a specified range to a corresponding terminal-specific integer output value based on predefined terminal types and ranges.
provide_code:
FUNCTION F_iScaleOutput : INT
VAR_INPUT
	rOutput: REAL; (* [] Physical output *)
	rPhyMin: REAL; (* [] Physical minimum *)
	rPhyMax: REAL; (* [] Physical maximum *)
	eTerminal: E_Ctrl_TerminalType; (* [] Terminal type. *)
END_VAR
